column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Event | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I live in an area with good train and bus coverage .
#text=I typically choose the train as it is more predictable but for some parts of the city that the train can not reach , I will take the bus .
#text=The bus stations are typically outdoors so depending on where I 'm going I 'll head to the nearest bus stop .
#text=There 's an app that shoes when the next bus is coming so I 'll take out my phone to see how long the wait is .
#text=Once the bus arrives , I take out my transit card to tap on the machine that collects the fare .
#text=This is done at the very beginning at the entrance of the bus .
#text=Once I hear the beep notifying me that the fare has been collected I will take a seat upstairs if it 's a double decker bus .
#text=The view is much better from the top and there are usually seats at the top .
#text=Now it 's time to sit back and enjoy the ride and get off at my destination .
